title: TIA extended audio
author: VD
content_html: I expect most of the Dread Ilk will have read TIA in one form or another given the fact that it’s been out for over a decade, but if you haven’t, I’ve posted a two-hour audio sample that consists of the first three chapters on the Darkstream. If that inspires you to pick up the whole audiobook, you can do so at Arkhaven.
content_text:
I expect most of the Dread Ilk will have read TIA in one form or another given the fact that it’s been out for over a decade, but if you haven’t, I’ve posted a two-hour audio sample that consists of the first three chapters
on the Darkstream
. If that inspires you to pick up the whole audiobook, you can do so
at Arkhaven
